messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The captain is demoted, and shall be punished. Give him 2 min in jail

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Head of Personnel's Office.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Max suit sensors please or you ain't gettin that mf revive

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Medbay has electrified grilles now, so if you try to break in you mega gay and i won't heal you
